sentences.en: a faith that carried them through the ordeal.
sentences.cn: 此信念支持他们通过严格的考验

sentences.en: All the ferries carry bicycles free or for a nominal charge.
sentences.cn: 所有的渡船都免费或以极低的收费运载自行车。

sentences.en: All the soldiers carried rifles.
sentences.cn: 所有的士兵都背着步枪。

sentences.en: Angela carried the child in her arms.
sentences.cn: 安杰拉把小孩抱在怀里。

sentences.en: carried off the difficult situation with aplomb.
sentences.cn: 镇静地应付了困难的局面

sentences.en: carried out the mission successfully.
sentences.cn: 成功地完成使命

sentences.en: carry a project through despite difficulties.
sentences.cn: 不顾困难地完成一项计划

sentences.en: carry on a love affair.
sentences.cn: 正在谈恋爱

sentences.en: carry on a thriving business.
sentences.cn: 经营繁忙的生意

sentences.en: carry on in the face of disaster.
sentences.cn: 面对灾难坚持不懈

sentences.en: carry out a new policy.
sentences.cn: 实行一项新政策

sentences.en: carry out instructions.
sentences.cn: 遵循教诲

sentences.en: Frogs eat pests which destroy crops and carry diseases.
sentences.cn: 青蛙吃破坏庄稼、传播疾病的害虫。

sentences.en: Gina was carrying a small bunch of flowers.
sentences.cn: 吉娜拿着一小束花。

sentences.en: He had the ruthless streak necessary to carry him into the Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他具有进入内阁所必需的冷酷性格。

sentences.en: He says he’s got to carry a knife to protect himself.
sentences.cn: 他说他必须带刀自卫。

sentences.en: He's got the experience and the authority to carry it off.
sentences.cn: 他的经验和威望足以做成这件事。

sentences.en: I don’t carry a handbag. I just carry money in my pocket.
sentences.cn: 我不带手提包，我就把钱放在口袋里。

sentences.en: I got a bit carried away when describing his dreadful season.
sentences.cn: 在描述他那段可怕的时间时，我有些失控。

sentences.en: It is expensive to buy and a bind to carry home.
sentences.cn: 买这个费用很贵，搬回家也费劲。

sentences.en: Jack carried his grandson up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 杰克把孙子抱上楼去。

sentences.en: Let me carry that for you.
sentences.cn: 让我帮你拿吧。

sentences.en: Many women know how to carry out repairs on their cars.
sentences.cn: 许多妇女懂得怎样修自己的车。

sentences.en: prejudices that have carried through over the centuries.
sentences.cn: 经过了几个世纪依然存在的偏见

sentences.en: Springs and rivers that drain into lakes carry dissolved nitrates and phosphates.
sentences.cn: 流入湖中的泉水和河水携带了溶于水的硝酸盐和磷酸盐。

sentences.en: The aim is for one wire to carry both television and telephone calls.
sentences.cn: 目的是用一根电线来传送电视和电话两种信号。

sentences.en: The burglars took just about anything they could carry.
sentences.cn: 窃贼们盗走了所有拿得动的东西。

sentences.en: The confidence gained in remedial classes carried over into the children's regular school work.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在辅导班上获得的自信持续到他们正常的学校学习中去

sentences.en: The indisputable fact is that computers carry out logical operations.
sentences.cn: 不容置疑的事实是，电脑执行逻辑操作指令。

sentences.en: The morning paper carried a story about demonstrations in New York and Washington D.C.
sentences.cn: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.en: The national TV network carries religious programmes.
sentences.cn: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

sentences.en: The offences carry a maximum sentence of 10 years.
sentences.cn: 这些罪行最高可判10年徒刑。

sentences.en: the report is expected to &B{carry} considerable &B{weight with} the administration.
sentences.cn: 这个报告预计将对政府产生重要影响。

sentences.en: The ship was carrying drugs.
sentences.cn: 这艘船上载有毒品。

sentences.en: There are more airplanes carrying more people than ever before.
sentences.cn: 飞机数量和载客数量都是前所未有的。

sentences.en: These buses will carry families upstate to visit relatives in prison.
sentences.cn: 这些公共汽车将载着家属北上去探监。

sentences.en: They were told to carry their wounded and leave their dead.
sentences.cn: 他们被命令抬走伤员，丢下死者。

sentences.en: Use a weatherproof rucksack to carry your camera and lenses around in.
sentences.cn: 用防风雨的帆布背包装照相机和镜头。

sentences.en: was carried away by desire.
sentences.cn: 被欲望冲昏了头脑

sentences.en: was carried off by a fever.
sentences.cn: 因发烧而死

sentences.en: We carry illustrations of these medals on our masthead.
sentences.cn: 我们在报头刊登这些奖章的图片。

sentences.en: Workers scrambled to carry priceless objects out of harm's way.
sentences.cn: 工人们争先恐后地将价值连城的物品运到安全的地方。

sentences.en: You have to carry a pager so that they can call you in at any time.
sentences.cn: 你得带个传呼机，以便他们随时可以联系到你。

words.tran_cn: 运输；运费；四轮马车；举止；客车厢

phrases.tran_cn: 战胜所有对手，完全成功
vt. 运回；拿回；使回想；使回忆起
&I{【会计学】} 转帐：将（帐目）转下一栏、页、册或另一帐户
延续：坚持到其他时间或情况
(英，非正式)（为错误或不端行为）承担责任
套利交易；套息交易；利差交易；息差交易

trans.tran_en: the distance a ball or bullet travels after it has been thrown, hit, or fired

trans.tran_cn: 拿，搬，扛，携带，佩戴，传输，传播，出售，支撑，承担（责任/后果），具有（特点），获得通过，保持姿态
trans.tran_en: to hold something in your hand or arms, or support it as you take it somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 运， 搬， 抱， 背； 传递； 输送； 执行； 携带， 怀着； 具有， 附有， 包含； 支撑， 承载
trans.tran_en: to hold something in your hand or arms, or support it as you take it somewhere
